title.text: Zhou qiaoli: A divide-and-conquer strategy for semantic dependency parsing

abstractContent.text: We describe our SemEval2012 shared Task 5 system in this paper.
The system includes three cascaded components: the tagging semantic role phrase, the identification of semantic role phrase, phrase and frame semantic dependency parsing.

entities.text: phrase and frame semantic dependency parsing

abstractContent.text: In this paper, semantic role phrase is tagged automatically based on rules, and takes Conditional Random Fields (CRFs) as the statistical identification model of semantic role phrase.
A projective graph-based parser is used as our semantic dependency parser.
Finally, we gain Labeled Attachment Score (LAS) of 61.84%, which ranked the first position.
At present, we gain the LAS of 62.08%, which is 0.24% higher than that ranked the first position in the task 5.

datasetContent.text: In this paper, we carryout comparative experiments of parsing for the test set by 3 systems.
